page.title: 14Entertainments
page.content: Accrington has a large selection of pubs discotheques and night clubs.In our block we have 14 pubs such as the Black Horse,Swan,Park Inn,Tramway Hotel,New Brewery and the Hargreaves Arms.In Accrington there has been a lot of modernizations to pubs and night clubs and this has attracted more people.In the local paper there is a competition to find the best pub of the year.There are a few disco's in Accrington. In Accrington there is a large number of recreation grounds where you can play all sports.There is a large running track near Sandy Lane.This also has a few tennis courts as well.There is a few tennis courts at Oak Hill Park.There is a bowling green as well.There are a few other parks as well.There is also a cinema in the town centre which is used a lot.
